ActJudges Act
SubjectHelen E. Gruchy ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. David W. Gruchy **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to HELEN E. GRUCHY, survivor of the Hon. David W. Gruchy, a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia, effective May 23, 2016.
